tool_description: FlashLive Sports provides the fastest live scores, standings and detailed stats. FlashLive covers thousands of competitions in 30+ sports. Soccer, football, baseball, tennis, basketball, hockey, golf mma, cricket, darts. Translation of players, teams and leagues (25 languages). You can make a website like: flashscore.com, or (tipsscore.com, livescore.com) **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters
name: FlashLive Sports
title: FlashLive Sports

api_list.name: Event Odds
api_list.description: Get odds by event ID

api_list.name: List of events
api_list.description:
Get a list of events by sport_id.
`STAGE_TYPE` - main event status, `STAGE` - more event status. [List of object statuses:](https://rapidapi.com/tipsters/api/flashlive-sports/tutorials/flashlive-list-of-object-statuses)

required_parameters.name: indent_days
required_parameters.description: Number of days from today. Ex: `-1` yesterday

api_list.description: Get a list of main odds by sport and date

api_list.name: Sports list
api_list.description: Get a list of sports
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flashlive-sports.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sports/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flashlive-sports.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flashlive-sports.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sports/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flashlive-sports.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
